message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business or personal life. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. If you're interested, let me know and we can discuss the details.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe the product is a great opportunity, but I need to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $10000?
